iPuzzler

A web component for publishing interactive crossword puzzles in iPuz format

Live Demo

Looks likeiPuzzler doesn't work on your web browser. Sorry!

Demo Source

<html>
  <head>
    <title>iPuzzler Demo</title>
    <script type="module" src="js/ipuzzler.js"></script>
  </head>
  <body>
    <ipuzzler-puzzle src="my-puzzle.ipuz"></ipuzzler-puzzle>
  </body>
</html>

Getting Started

  1. Download js/ipuzzler.js and css/ipuzzler.css
  2. Add <script type="module" src="js/ipuzzler.js"></script> to the <head> of your page.
  3. Publish your crossword puzzle in iPuz format
  4. Add <ipuzzler-puzzle src="my-puzzle.ipuz"></ipuzzler-puzzle> to your page.

Thatâ€™s it.
